subject: Football
Super Bowl
Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
lead_paragraph: According to TiqIQ.com, a search engine that scans online ticket resellers, the average asking price for a ticket is $2,645.12, which is 34 percent less than on the day of the A.F.C. and N.F.C. championship games on Jan. 19.
